text: Vijat Mohindra (born 1985) is an Indian American fashion photographer who has worked with celebrities.https://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/2011/05/20/miley- cyrus-wows-in-vijat_n_864587.html He was born in Ohio and is based in Los Angeles. == Exhibitions and other works == * Always Believe that something wonderful is about to happen (2016) * Lepore == Reference == == External links == * * Category:Fashion photographers Category:1985 births Category:Living people
title: Vijat Mohindra
